column4: is vmware part of the repositories? how do i do a search for an app in the repositories?
regardless oCean_ , how do I search the repositories for an app?
Graphical through menu (add/remove) or command: "apt-cache search <string>"
It seems that Ikonia is away from keyboard, for time being. Anyway it might be good advice to decribe your problem, including some details (like things you've already tried)
when you do that in a pastebin link, you can paste that link every so now and then in the channel, asking for help, but no longer have the need to re-word your problems over and over again
I ask you once more. Have you seen my advice?
the couple of lines I send to you, just a few minutes ago
I now you were here earlier, I know what happened. That is why I recommend to decribe your problem + details (like what you've already done/tried) in a pastebin link
I'm just trying to help you
well i kinda fixed the problem, i just need to do something...kinda like A or B, but im not sure which
in grub, how do I know which HDD to type in "setup" command
ok, now *that* is a very great question!
very straightforward, no nonsense. However, unfortunately I'm not that grub expert. But that question is absolutely one you can ask the channel right here
